blogPost.excerpt: Bounty lets you get paid for referring friends to jobs. If you don't know someone you can refer, share the bounty and get a cut of the prize pool.
blogPost.body: Bounty lets you get paid for referring friends to jobs. If you don't know someone you can refer, share the bounty and get a cut of the prize pool.
blogPost.title: Bounty - Get paid for referring friends to jobs 💰
blogPost.author: Tina Jiang

localize.description: Bounty可以让你因推荐朋友工作而获得报酬。如果您不认识可以推荐的人，分享赏金并获得奖金池的一部分。
localize.tagline: 推荐朋友工作获得报酬 💰

localize.description: Bounty可以讓你因推薦朋友工作而獲得報酬。如果您不認識可以推薦的人，分享賞金並獲得獎金池的一部分。
localize.tagline: 推薦朋友工作獲得報酬 💰

localize.description: 黑曜石是一款为安全、隐私、可用性和跨设备无缝同步而设计的OTP认证器。
黑曜石是一款爲安全、隱私、可用性和跨設備無縫同步而設計的OTP認證器。

next.excerpt: not less but better is the digital wellbeing app that helps you become resilient to digital distraction. Learn healthy phone use with 5 minutes of practice a day and feel in control again. Developed by psychologists, backed by science, and proven to work.
next.title: not less but better - Build healthy phone habits with 5 minutes a day 😌

localize.description: 少而精 "是一款数字健康应用，可以帮助你抵御数字分心。通过每天5分钟的练习，学会健康使用手机，再次感受到自己的控制力。由心理学家开发，得到科学支持，并被证明有效。
localize.tagline: 建立健康的手机习惯，每天5分钟😌。

localize.description: 少而精 "是一款數字健康應用，可以幫助你抵禦數字分心。通過每天5分鐘的練習，學會健康使用手機，再次感受到自己的控制力。由心理學家開發，得到科學支持，並被證明有效。
localize.tagline: 建立健康的手機習慣，每天5分鐘😌。
